statements: SELECT * FROM ab_testing WHERE group_id = 1;
SELECT experiment_id, user_id, variant FROM ab_testing WHERE conversion = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, variant FROM ab_testing WHERE experiment_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, conversion FROM ab_testing WHERE group_id = 2 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, group_id, variant FROM ab_testing WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY group_id, experiment_id ASC;
SELECT experiment_id, user_id, group_id, variant, conversion FROM ab_testing WHERE group_id = 1 ORDER BY experiment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ab_testing WHERE variant = 'control' AND conversion = TRUE ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT experiment_id, user_id, variant FROM ab_testing WHERE conversion = FALSE ORDER BY user_id, experiment_id;
SELECT user_id, group_id FROM ab_testing WHERE experiment_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY group_id, user_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT group_id FROM ab_testing WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY group_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE date_joined > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-07-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, target_audience FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT username,email,date_joined FROM users ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT campaign_name,start_date,end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Students' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT user_id,username,email FROM users WHERE date_joined >= '2022-01-01' AND date_joined <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN marketing_campaigns ON users.user_id = marketing_campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM ab_tests;
SELECT test_id, test_name, start_date, end_date FROM ab_tests WHERE test_group = 1;
SELECT test_name, test_description FROM ab_tests WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT test_name, test_group FROM ab_tests WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';

SELECT test_results.result_id, ab_tests.test_name, test_variations.variation_name FROM test_results INNER JOIN ab_tests ON test_results.test_id = ab_tests.test_id INNER JOIN test_variations ON test_results.test_variation = test_variations.variation_name;
SELECT test_name, start_date, end_date FROM ab_tests WHERE test_group = 1;
SELECT test_name, COUNT(*) AS total_tests FROM ab_tests GROUP BY test_name;
SELECT test_name, test_description, user_segment FROM ab_tests JOIN test_results ON ab_tests.test_id = test_results.test_id WHERE goal_achieved = TRUE;
SELECT test_name, variation_name, variation_content FROM ab_tests JOIN test_variations ON ab_tests.test_id = test_variations.test_id WHERE variation_id = 1;
SELECT test_name, test_description, variation_name, variation_description FROM ab_tests JOIN test_variations ON ab_tests.test_id = test_variations.test_id WHERE test_group = 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT u.username, c.campaign_name, e.event_name FROM users u JOIN events e ON u.user_id = e.user_id JOIN campaigns c ON e.campaign_id = c.campaign_id WHERE u.age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY e.event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, a.variation, a.conversion FROM users u JOIN ab_test_results a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.conversion = true ORDER BY u.username ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM user_data ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id,name,email FROM user_data WHERE country='USA';
SELECT experiment_id,experiment_name,start_date FROM experiment_a WHERE group_id=1;
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate),MAX(revenue) FROM experiment_results;
SELECT campaign_name,clicks,impressions,conversion_rate FROM campaign_performance ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY name DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM user_data WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' AND country = 'Canada';
SELECT experiment_name, group_id, start_date FROM experiment_a WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND start_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate), MAX(session_duration) FROM experiment_results WHERE user_id = 1001 AND group_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, impressions, conversion_rate FROM campaign_performance ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC, clicks DESC;
